title: Top 5 Tools That Changed the Detailing Industry - /DRIVE CLEAN
description: The purpose of this episode is to provide you with an overview of the top 5 detailing tools that have heavily changed the approach and techniques of modern detailers. Along the way we intend to provide you with a brief explanation of what makes these products so revolutionary and how they have changed best-practices in the detailing industry. These breakthroughs are also to be credited for cutting down on time as well as increasing safety and execution levels across the paint correction process.
